name: Lucas the Game
description:
Upon birth, Lucas learns from his mother's prophecy about his supreme destiny. It seems he's the last hope for the future of humanity.

She immediately gives him a change of clothing and warns him his mission will be hard. Lucas is at a loss for words, but thinks he can do it. Not wanting to disappoint her, he heads off on what can only be described as a bazaar adventure.

■ dedicated chiptune soundtrack

Warning: contains some mature humor.

Game by Timothy Courtney
